justification: Correctly targets B’s WR surplus and RB need and notes playoff schedule, but ignores B’s injury caution (both Isaiah and Austin Q) and preference for consensus/stack fits. A’s injury-averse profile clashes with acquiring a Q-tag WR, and calling Isaiah a “stable WR1” is overstated. Value is lopsided (A sends a Tier 1 RB plus a fringe WR for a Tier 2 WR). Rationale is concise but thin on roster/context specifics.
